thread.title: very enjoyable stay
thread.title_full: very enjoyable stay - Review of Hotel Nicolo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: christopherbC5553JY
title: very enjoyable stay
text: Two metro stations nearby, lots of nice shops too including a Monoprix for food items. The room was very clean and everyone from housekeeping to the front desk did everything they could to make our stay pleasant. The artwork in the room and throughout the hotel is very tasteful and adds a lot of style. Would gladly stay there again.
